headline: Ask HN: What apps or browser extensions do you use to read articles quicker?
description:
I often find that at the end of each day I've saved roughly 5-20 articles. I keep them in my Roam graph, but I rarely go back and read them.

The issue isn't that I have a lack of quality links. That's more the problem than anything. Instead of hoarding these and never actually reading them, I was wondering if there are tools out there that can help me digest articles more quickly? I think that's why I don't read them. I just don't have the time.

There seems to be a lot of mobile apps that attempt to solve this problem, but I've found their summaries lacking quite a bit.

I've also tried apps like Speechify that turn articles into audio. It works fine, but it still suffers from robotic like interpretation, and it's still the entire article, often taking longer to listen to than read.

Does anyone use a tool, technique, chrome extension, etc. to read more articles during the day?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 你用什么应用程序或浏览器扩展来更快地阅读文章？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 你用什麼應用程序或瀏覽器擴展來更快地閱讀文章？
description_zh-Hans:
我经常发现，在每天结束的时候，我已经保存了大约5-20篇文章。我把它们保存在我的漫游图中，但我很少回去阅读它们。

问题不在于我缺乏高质量的链接。这是比任何事情都重要的问题。我在想，与其囤积这些东西而不去真正阅读它们，是否有一些工具可以帮助我更快地消化文章？我想这就是我不读它们的原因。

似乎有很多移动应用程序试图解决这个问题，但我发现它们的摘要有相当大的不足之处。

有人使用工具、技术、chrome扩展等在白天阅读更多的文章吗？
